    <div class = 'norender'><code>
    function setup() {
      let myArray = ['A', 'B', 'C'];
      print(myArray); // ['A', 'B', 'C']
      let newArray = shorten(myArray);
      print(myArray); // ['A','B','C']
      print(newArray); // ['A','B']
